thoughts.text: Now that I have saved the link to the scavenger hunt, I think I can use the 'browse_website' command to open the website and learn more about the activity.
thoughts.reasoning: Opening the website can help me learn more about the scavenger hunt and decide if it's something I want to pursue. The 'browse_website' command is a good way to open the website.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'browse_website' command to open the website and learn more about the activity
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time browsing the internet and instead focus on taking action and actually pursuing one of the activities.
thoughts.speak: Now that I have saved the link to the scavenger hunt, I will use the 'browse_website' command to open the website and learn more about the activity. Is that okay?

args.question: What are some fun scavenger hunt ideas for kids?
